item.title: 汉莎航空与机组人员达成工资协议，避免了罢工
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）与机舱乘务员达成工资协议，结束了欧洲最大航空集团因瘫痪性罢工而中断的数月紧张谈判。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG clinched a wage accord with cabin crew, ending months of intense negotiations that had been punctured by crippling strikes at Europe’s largest airline group.】

item.title: 汉莎航空在紧张局势加剧之际暂停伊朗航线
item.description: 在中东紧张局势升级之际，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）暂停了飞往德黑兰的航线。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG has suspended services to Tehran amid an escalation in tensions in the Middle East.】

item.description:

item.title: 娇韵诗护肤品继承人正在寻找下一个大收购项目
item.description: 法国娇韵诗（Clarins）护肤品财富的继承人与行业巨头欧莱雅（L'Oreal SA）争夺澳大利亚著名品牌伊索（Aesop —），结果败下阵来。【原文：The heirs to France’s Clarins skincare fortune went up against industry giant L’Oreal SA in a battle for popular Australian brand Aesop — and lost.】

item.title: 美国通胀加速，亚洲新兴市场降息几率减弱
item.description: 在美国通胀强于预期促使市场推迟全球最大经济体放松货币政策的可能性之后，亚洲各国央行可能不得不考虑今年减少或不减息的可能性。【原文：Asian central banks may have to consider the possibility of fewer or no rate cuts this year after stronger-than-expected US inflation drove markets to push back the probability of monetary policy easing in the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 交易员缩减英国央行宽松政策押注 2024 年减息少于两次
item.description: 由于全球市场在美国通胀数据公布后调整了预期，投资者减少了对英国央行宽松货币政策的押注，不再完全相信今年会有两次降息。【原文：Investors pared bets on monetary easing from the Bank of England and no longer fully price two interest-rate cuts this year as global markets adjust expectations after the US inflation data.】

item.title: 债券交易员将思维转向收益率为 5%、不降息的世界
item.description: 由于美联储今年不降息的可能性越来越大，债券交易员正准备迎接 10 年期美国国债收益率突破 5%。【原文：Bond traders are readying for 10-year US Treasury yields surpassing 5% as the scenario of no rate cuts by the Federal Reserve this year looks increasingly possible.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行前债券下跌，交易员重新评估全球利率前景
item.description: 在美国出人意料的通胀数据刺激全球货币政策前景迅速重新定价之后，交易员们押注欧洲央行和英格兰银行今年将减少降息次数并放慢降息速度。【原文：Traders are betting the European Central Bank and Bank of England will deliver fewer and slower interest-rate cuts this year after a surprisingly hot inflation reading in the US spurred a rapid repricing in the outlook for monetary policy globally.】

item.title: 英国央行格林加入鹰派声音，警告不要提前降息
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，英国降息 "应该还遥遥无期"，因为英国持续通胀的风险高于美国和其他国家。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene said interest rates cuts in the UK “should still be a way off” because Britain has a higher risk of persistent inflation than the US and other countries.】

item.title: 油价飙升将拖累韩元跌至 1,400 美元兑 1 美元
item.description: 韩国的韩元在周四跌至 17 个月低点后远未触底反弹，因为预计石油价格将达到每桶 100 美元，这对韩元的压力与日俱增。【原文：South Korea’s won is far from bottoming out after falling to a 17-month low on Thursday, as pressure on the currency is seen growing with projections for oil to reach $100 a barrel.】

item.title: WeBuyCars 4.16 亿美元首次公开募股后在约翰内斯堡亮相
item.description: Transaction Capital Ltd. 的二手车业务 WeBuyCars 在约翰内斯堡证券交易所挂牌交易，这是今年预计上市的 10 家公司中的第一批。【原文：Transaction Capital Ltd.’s used-car business, WeBuyCars, opened for trading on the Johannesburg Stock Exchange, among the first of 10 expected listings this year.】

item.title: 在新任首席执行官的领导下，荷兰发展银行期待投资银行业务的增长
item.description: 南非的奈德银行集团（Nedbank Group Ltd.）希望招聘更多的投资银行家，以利用这个非洲最发达经济体在可再生能源、水和物流领域激增的交易。【原文：South Africa’s Nedbank Group Ltd. is hoping to hire more investment bankers as it seeks to take advantage of a surge of deals in renewable energy, water and logistics in Africa’s most developed economy.】

item.title: 津巴布韦 ZiG 货币反弹进入第三天，对美元汇率上涨 0.4
item.description: 根据中央银行的数据，津巴布韦新货币 ZiG 自周一发行以来对美元的汇率升幅最大。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency ZiG strengthened the most against the dollar since its launch on Monday, according to central bank data.】

item.title: 兄弟成为市场主管后，中资银行高层卸任
item.description: 中国国际金融有限公司（China International Capital Corp.，简称 "中国国投"）总裁在其兄弟被任命为中国最高市场监管机构负责人两个月后辞去了其职务。【原文：The president of China International Capital Corp. has relinquished his post two months after his brother was named as the head of the country’s top markets regulator.】

item.title: 中国平安延迟偿还信托显示房地产问题仍未解决
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司（Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.’s trust business delayed repayment on a property-linked investment product, showing how the financial giant’s asset-management operations are still reeling from China’s prolonged real estate downturn.】

item.title: 尼日利亚货币为何反弹及其对经济的意义
item.description: 尼日利亚每天抽取近 150 万桶石油，是非洲大陆最大的产油国。然而，这个石油美元国家却一再面临硬通货短缺的问题，经济因此陷入困境。2023 年 5 月上任的博拉-蒂努布总统已着手整顿该国的外汇市场并吸引投资，但这一过程一直磕磕绊绊。本币奈拉的贬值刺激了通货膨胀，央行的反应是大幅提高借贷成本。【原文：Nigeria pumps almost 1.5 million barrels of oil a day, making it the continent’s biggest producer. Yet this petrodollar nation faces repeated shortages of hard currency that choke its economy. President Bola Tinubu, who took office in May 2023, has moved to overhaul the country’s foreign-exchange market and attract investment, but the process has been bumpy. The devaluation of the local naira currency stoked inflation, and the central bank reacted by sharply increasing borrowing costs — at the r】

item.title: 东京写字楼空置率创三年新低，与全球低迷形势背道而驰
item.description: 3 月份，东京的写字楼空置率降至三年来的最低点，这表明日本首都的商业地产市场正在抵御肆虐全球各大城市的经济衰退。【原文：Tokyo office vacancies dropped to a three-year low in March, a sign that the commercial real estate market in the Japanese capital is withstanding the slump afflicting major cities around the world.】

item.title: 香港交易所提出为现金交易设立多家结算银行的计划
item.description: 投资者可能很快就会获准为其在香港交易及结算所有限公司（Hong Kong Exchanges & Clearing Ltd.）进行的现金股票和期权交易选择一家以上的结算银行。【原文：Investors may soon be allowed to enlist more than one clearing bank for their cash equities and options trades on the Hong Kong Exchanges & Clearing Ltd.】

item.title: 曼哈顿公寓租金下降显示市场稳定
item.description: 曼哈顿的公寓租金在连续数月上涨后，3 月份出人意料地出现了下降，但这不太可能是市场疲软的迹象。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents unexpectedly declined in March after months of increases, though it’s unlikely to be a sign of a softening market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将按兵不动，首次降息锁定在 6 月：决策指南
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将在第五次会议上继续搁置借贷成本，同时进一步为 6 月份开始的削减做好准备。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to keep borrowing costs on hold for a fifth meeting while further readying the ground for cuts to begin in June.】

item.title: 产能过剩导致中国太阳能硅产量降至 2020 年以来最低水平
item.description: 由于产能过剩和激烈竞争导致整个行业利润减少，中国的太阳能硅价格跌至三年来的最低点。【原文：Solar silicon prices in China plunged to a three-year low as overcapacity and fierce competition slash profits across the industry.】

item.title: 乐天成本高昂的垃圾债券预示着日本亿万富翁三木谷将面临挑战
item.description: 在连续五年亏损之后，亿万富翁三木谷浩史（Hiroshi Mikitani）的乐天集团（Rakuten Group Inc.事实证明，这样做的代价是昂贵的。【原文：After five straight years of losses, billionaire Hiroshi Mikitani’s Rakuten Group Inc. is trying to bounce back from a move into mobile that cost it billions of dollars. Doing so is proving expensive.】

item.title: 习近平与马英九会面，中台贸易数据显示分歧日益扩大
item.description: 中国领导人习近平和台湾前总统马英九刚刚通过一次具有里程碑意义的会晤，强调了海峡两岸亲如一家的观点。但贸易数据却告诉我们一个不同的故事。【原文：Chinese leader Xi Jinping and former Taiwan President Ma Ying-jeou just used a landmark meeting to underscore their view that the two sides of the strait are close as family. Trade data tell a different story.】

item.title: 中国城市进一步放宽购房政策以刺激销售
item.description: 由于长期的销售低迷给经济和房地产开发商造成了沉重的压力，中国地方政府正在加紧放宽住房市场的规定。【原文：China’s local governments are stepping up the easing of rules for their housing markets, as a protracted sales slump weighs on the economy and real estate developers.】

item.title: 淡马锡斥资 180 亿美元进军欧洲，瞄准富裕家族企业
item.description: 淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）计划加大在欧洲的投资力度，该公司新任当地负责人预计，欧洲的挫折将为这家新加坡国有投资者带来重大机遇。【原文：Temasek Holdings Pte plans to ramp up investment in Europe, undeterred by setbacks in a region that its new local chief expects will provide significant opportunities for the Singapore state investor.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势抵消通胀热度，黄金重拾涨势
item.description: 由于中东紧张局势加剧，抵消了美联储今年降息幅度将低于预期的担忧，黄金重拾涨势。【原文：Gold resumed its blistering rally as heightened tensions in the Middle East offset concerns that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates less than expected this year.】

item.title: 中国加大对人民币的支持力度，定盘价创下历史最高纪录
item.description: 由于美元的广泛走强使人民币接近政策禁区，中国发出了继续支持本国货币的信号。【原文：China signaled continued support for its currency as broad strength in the dollar kept the yuan close to a policy no-go area.】
